description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMolten Spray:
This creature always has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN}. After your creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN} {ACTION_attack}, they deal damage to each enemy equal to 50% of the damage dealt. This trait does not stack.
name: Molten Keratin
